formula:
(
  1400 if base <= 29699 else
  1700 if base <= 34000 else
  2000
) if custom_uploaded_leave_without_pay <= 10 else (
  (1400 if base <= 29699 else
   1700 if base <= 34000 else
   2000) * (30 - custom_uploaded_leave_without_pay) / 30
)
name: Medical Allowance

formula:
base == "Employee" and
month_start_date.month in (6, 12) and
employee.designation in ["Technician", "Supervisor", "Assistant Engineer"]
and custom_labour_welfare_fund or 0
name: Labour Welfare Fund

formula: (1400 if custom_vehicle_type == "4 Wheeler" else 750 if custom_vehicle_type == "2 Wheeler" else 350) if payment_days >= round(0.75 * total_working_days) else (0 if payment_days < 10 else (1400 if custom_vehicle_type == "4 Wheeler" else 750 if custom_vehicle_type == "2 Wheeler" else 350) * payment_days / total_working_days)
name: Conv. Allowance

formula:
((BP + SW + VDA) * 0.0949 if custom_employee_pension_scheme == "EPS-9.49  ER-2.51" else
 1250 if custom_employee_pension_scheme == "EPS-1250  ER-550" else
 min((BP + SW + VDA) + 1250) if custom_employee_pension_scheme == "EPS-1250  ER-12%-1250" else
 (BP + SW + VDA) * 0.0833 if custom_employee_pension_scheme == "EPS-8.33  ER-3.67" else 0)
name: Employee PF

formula: custom_uploaded_leave_without_pay > 10 and (custom_canteen_subsidy * (30 - custom_uploaded_leave_without_pay)/ 30) - custom_canteen_recovery or custom_canteen_subsidy - custom_canteen_recovery
name: Canteen Subsidy
